content:
Sure, here is a potential cover letter based on the information you provided:

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to apply for the position of Software Developer at your company. I recently graduated from IIT Jodhpur with a B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering, and I am excited about the opportunity to apply my skills and knowledge in a professional setting.

I have a strong background in software development, with experience working in Java, React/React Native, C++, Python, TypeScript, and JavaScript. I have interned at MIT, USA as a React developer, where I worked on the Scratch platform. I have also worked as a Senior Software Engineer at Envestnet Yodlee and am currently working as an IT Analyst at TCS on the same project.

I am a self-starter and a quick learner, and I am confident in my ability to contribute to your team. I am excited about the opportunity to work for a company that is at the forefront of technology and innovation.

In addition to my technical skills, I have published two research papers on IEEE and AAAI, which demonstrates my ability to conduct in-depth research and analysis. I am also among the top 0.2% out of 14 lakhs students all over India in JEE advanced in 2017, which showcases my strong problem-solving and critical thinking abilities.

I would be thrilled to have the opportunity to discuss this position further and to learn more about your company. Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,
Geetesh Gupta
